content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad we are discussing the rental price. Let's start with a high price and negotiate from there. How does 1500 euros per month sound to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is too high for me. I am a student and I am looking for the lowest possible price. Do you have a lower price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I can offer a lower price, but it will be close to the market value. How about 900 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is still too high for me. I am a student and I am looking for the lowest possible price. Do you have a lower price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I can offer a lower price, but it will be close to the market value. How about 800 euros per month? I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe this is already a very low price for the location and amenities of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I still think that is too high. How about 600 euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but that is too low for this apartment. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because that price is far below the market value for this type of apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. How about 700 euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That sounds more reasonable. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we have already agreed on a price that is close to the market value for this type of apartment in the city center. I agree to the price of [700] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
